abstract: Golden State Warriors head coach Steve Kerr, who has been struggling with complications from back surgery, leads team that is on track to break record for most regular season wins currently held by 1995-96 Chicago Bulls; his influence on reigning champs and their success discussed.

headline.print_headline: A Long, Fragile Path to Greatness
headline.main: Steve Kerr Leads Warriors’ Chase of a Record He Helped Set

snippet: The Golden State Warriors are 48-4 and on pace to win more games than any other N.B.A. team ever, including the 1995-96 Chicago Bulls, which Kerr graced as a bench player.
lead_paragraph: The Golden State Warriors are 48-4 and on pace to win more games than any other N.B.A. team ever, including the 1995-96 Chicago Bulls, which Kerr graced as a bench player.
